data.text: @BarrySkywalker1 The wrote an entire article basically begging and praising Walter Hamada and Toby Emmerich.

@BarrySkywalker1 @ourmoviereview Reliable means they don't post second source crap they get statements directly from the company

In this case it's the company that's unreliable
@ourmoviereview Deadline is one of the most consistent and reliable sources in Hollywood.
@ourmoviereview Next i hope we hear of massive reshoots for both movies post merger to incorporate the Snyderverse 😬
